channel.title: Bare Metal Cloud Status - Incident History

item.title: [GRA1][Dedicated Servers] - Rack G135B18
item.description:
THIS IS A SCHEDULED EVENT Jul 23, 00:00 - 02:00 UTC

Jun 3, 16:17 UTC
Scheduled - As part of our continuous improvement plan, maintenance is scheduled on our public and private networks (Vrack) in the rack G135B18.

Start time : 23/07/2025 00:00 UTC
End time : 23/07/2025 02:00 UTC
Service impact : Public and private networks (Vrack) will be temporarily unavailable for servers located in the specified rack during the maintenance.
Service improvement : As part of our continuous improvement policy, we will be doing a maintenance on a network equipment.

Thank you for your understanding.

item.description:

Thank you for your understanding.

item.title: [BHS][Storage and Backups] - NAS HA maintenance notification
item.description:
THIS IS A SCHEDULED EVENT Jul 3, 04:30 - 10:00 UTC

Jun 20, 13:48 UTC
Scheduled - As part of our continuous improvement plan, maintenance is scheduled on our Bare Metal Cloud offer.

Start time : 03/07/2025 04:30 UTC
End time : 03/07/2025 10:00 UTC
Service impact : Impacted services might experience some input/output freezes for storage equipment during the maintenance.
Service improvement : As part of our continuous improvement policy, we will perform an update on the storage servers hosting your data.
This version will improve certain security mechanisms, as well as some performance enhancements.
During the maintenance period, your data will remain available.

Thank you for your understanding.

item.title: [RBX2][Dedicated Servers] - Maintenance on Rack 22B15
item.description:
THIS IS A SCHEDULED EVENT Jun 24, 22:30 UTC  -  Jun 25, 03:00 UTC

Jun 17, 20:23 UTC
Scheduled - As part of our continuous improvement plan, maintenance is scheduled on our Dedicated Servers offer.

This may temporarily affect availability.

Start time : 24/06/2025 22:30 UTC
End time : 25/06/2025 03:00 UTC
Service impact : The servers in rack 22B15 will be unavailable for up to two hours while they are being moved during the operation.
Service improvement : As part of our continuous improvement policy, we will be migrating servers from rack 22B15 within the same rack to another electrical equipment.

Thank you for your understanding.

item.title: [GLOBAL][Baremetal] - Debian-10-based rescue system (rescue-customer boot mode) removal
item.description:
THIS IS A SCHEDULED EVENT Jun 23, 09:00 - 13:00 UTC

Apr 17, 14:50 UTC
Scheduled - As part of our continuous improvement plan, maintenance is scheduled on our Baremetal offer.

Start time : 23/06/2025 09:00 UTC
End time : 23/06/2025 13:00 UTC
Service impact : The Debian-10-based rescue system (rescue-customer boot mode) will no longer be available after 23/06/2025.
Service improvement : The objective of this maintenance is to remove the Debian-10-based rescue system (rescue-customer boot mode) for all Baremetal products.
Customers should start using the new Debian-12-based rescue system (rescue12-customer).

Thank you for your understanding.

item.title: [LIM3][Dedicated Servers] - Rack LIM0309A04B incident notification
item.description:
Jun 22, 18:53 UTC
Resolved - We would like to inform you that the incident on rack LIM0309A04B has now been resolved.

Here is detail for this incident :
Start time : 22/06/2025 18:00 UTC
End time : 22/06/2025 18:38 UTC
Impacted Service(s) : Some servers in rack LIM0309A04B were temporarily unavailable.
Customers Impact : Some customers were temporarily unable to access and use their servers in the specified rack.
Root Cause : This incident was caused by an electrical equipment issue.

We thank you for your understanding and patience throughout this incident.
